comments.body:
Do you mind changing this to `import scalanative.libc.errno.ERANGE`?

This is a case where it is required in C lib and is also in posixlib but we don't have to depend on POSIX here. I moved the macro C code to `clib` but both `clib` and `posixlib` Scala point to the same macro code.
Come to think about it, maybe this is better for another PR.

I would agree that it might make cleaner commit history if it that change would be applied in other PR. Especially if it would be needed to make some additional changes or change dependencies in `build.sbt`
